main event: A witness reported sighting an unidentified object in the Canton-Akron area on 17 May 1964.
interesting points: The witness refused to identify themselves when calling Lockbourne AFB., The object was reported to have a green light but did not actually have one as expected for an aircraft., Approximately 100-150 people playing BINGO saw the object during its flight., The sighting lasted for about 6-7 minutes with additional reports of lights resembling headlights., The object's flight path was ESE, and it was described as slower than a blimp.
witness description: witness refused to give their name
